first.title: تبلیغی خلاقانه تر و فراتر
first.description: لورم ایپسوم متن ساختگی با تولید سادگی نامفهوم از صنعت چاپ و با استفاده از طراحان گرافیک است

kitchen.title: Kitchen
kitchen.description: A modern kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and ample storage space.

masterBedroom.title: Master Bedroom
masterBedroom.description: A large master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a walk-in closet.

guestBedroom.title: Guest Bedroom
guestBedroom.description: A cozy guest bedroom with a queen-sized bed and a dresser.

bathroom.title: Bathroom
bathroom.description: A clean and well-maintained bathroom with a bathtub and shower.

diningRoom.title: Dining Room
diningRoom.description: An elegant dining room with a large table that can seat up to eight people.

office.title: Office
office.description: A quiet office space with a desk, chair, and bookshelf, perfect for working from home.

basement.title: Basement
basement.description: A finished basement with a home theater and additional storage space.

backyard.title: Backyard
backyard.description: A large backyard with a patio, garden, and plenty of space for outdoor activities.

garage.title: Garage
garage.description: A two-car garage with extra room for tools and equipment.
